name: algo
description: Algodons algo repository with automated CI/CD

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const hasSrc=fs.existsSync('src');const hasViteConfig=fs.existsSync('vite.config.js')||fs.existsSync('vite.config.ts');if(!hasSrc||!hasViteConfig){console.warn('\u001b[33m[WARNING] The project requires a src/ directory and a Vite config file (vite.config.js or vite.config.ts) before running build scripts. Please set up the project structure.\u001b[0m');}"
scripts.lint: dirs=""; [ -d src ] && dirs="$dirs src"; [ -d server ] && dirs="$dirs server"; [ -n "$dirs" ] && eslint $dirs --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx || echo 'No src/ or server/ directory to lint.'
scripts.lint:fix: dirs=""; [ -d src ] && dirs="$dirs src"; [ -d server ] && dirs="$dirs server"; [ -n "$dirs" ] && eslint $dirs --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --fix || echo 'No src/ or server/ directory to lint.'
